have all argued for such control. title: The shops in the forum of the Roman City at Empúries were actually reconstructed in the Augustan era, having the doors that opened onto the forum blocked and new doors opened to provide access to the shops from outside of the forum. Once the change was complete, one could not enter the shops from the forum but had to leave the forum to enter them
